Data Structures | Macros
Multimedia Card Interface
Stratify OS » Device Interface

Detailed Description

The MCI peripheral is used to communicate with SD and MMC cards

Data Structures

struct  mci_attr_t
 PIO Attribute Data Structure. More...
 

Macros

#define I_MCI_GETATTR
 IOCTL request to get the attributes.
 
#define I_MCI_SETATTR
 IOCTL request to set the attributes.
 
#define I_MCI_SETACTION
 IOCTL request to set the action.
